data.actual_result: It will crash your Discord, making you have to refresh it.
data.expected_result: It should re-direct you to the "friends" menu, and open up the new group DM pop-up.
data.short_description: Using the "Create a private group" shortcut (command + shift + t) or (control + shift + t) while in the Activity, Library or Store menu will crash Discord if you go to your friends menu.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the Discord Store or the Activity menu or the Discord Library. - Use the "Create a private group" shortcut  (command + shift + t) or (control + shift + t) - Go to your friends tab.
